gnome_templates¶

gnome_templates are files for development processes in GNOME.

The README is used to introduce the tool and provide instructions on how to install the tool, any machine dependencies it may have and any other information that should be provided before the tool is installed.

Installation¶

Navigate to release page download and extract release archive.

To install gnome_templates type the following:

tar xvzf gnome_templates-x.y.z.tar.gz
cd gnome_templates-x.y.z
cp -R Templates/ /home/${USER}/Templates

Dependencies¶

gnome_templates requires next modules and libraries:

  • None

Lets help and support GNOME.
